answers.answer: If you are not sure better safe then sorry call doctor and see what they say.  I'm 30 weeks Tuesday I know what you mean, I'm uncomfortable too.Hope you get some answers.

question: Im 30 weeks. Im 35 years old. I have gestational diabetes. Im under a lot of stress. Im having a lot of pressure down below and very uncomfortable for two days now i sleep on the floor on couch cushions, should i get checked or not worry?
title: when to go to hospital
